mapper.insert: INSERT INTO transaction ( client_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount, expected_payment_date, recovered_date, recovered_amount, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{entity.clientId}, STR_TO_DATE(#{entity.transactionDate}, '%Y-%m-%d'), #{entity.transactionAmount}, STR_TO_DATE(#{entity.expectedPaymentDate}, '%Y-%m-%d'), STR_TO_DATE(#{entity.recoveredDate}, '%Y-%m-%d'), #{entity.recoveredAmount}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT c.client_id, c.name, MIN(t.transaction_date ) as start_transaction_date, COUNT(1) AS total_count, SUM(CASE WHEN t.expected_payment_date < NOW() THEN t.transaction_amount ELSE 0 END) AS total_amount, SUM(CASE WHEN t.expected_payment_date < NOW() THEN t.recovered_amount ELSE 0 END) AS recovered_amount, ROUND( SUM(CASE WHEN t.expected_payment_date < NOW() THEN t.recovered_amount ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(SUM(CASE WHEN t.expected_payment_date < NOW() THEN t.transaction_amount ELSE 0 END), 0) * 100, 2 ) AS recovered_rate, ROUND(AVG( CASE WHEN t.recovered_date IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(t.recovered_date, t.transaction_date) ELSE DATEDIFF(DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY), t.transaction_date) END )) AS avg_recovered_days, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m') AS month FROM `transaction` t JOIN client c ON c.client_id = t.client_id where DATE(t.expected_payment_date) < CURDATE() GROUP BY c.client_id, c.name
mapper.update: UPDATE `transaction` t SET transaction_date = #{entity.transactionDate}, transaction_amount = #{entity.transactionAmount}, recovered_date = #{entity.recoveredDate}, recovered_amount = #{entity.recoveredAmount}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE transaction_id = #{entity.transactionId} AND client_id = #{entity.clientId}
